comment: I haven't even finished taking this class and I can truly say I cannot stand this man. He is no help, and his tests are so heavily reliant on lockdown. I have taken two tests so far, and both times have had points taken off because of my environment. Do yourself a favor and do not take him.

Take class with someone else. Very relient on lockdown browser. Even when I tried to do what he asked he would take 50% off of every test because he didn't like the angle of the way I was sitting. He took 50% because the calculator I was using wasn't right when it was the one listed in the syllabus. Never responded to emails.

As others have said on here, he is provenly very strict with lock down browsers. I've had 50% and another 25% off my very first test because I did not have a web cam or proper set up to show my entire environment and desk. You'll be reliant on your own learning besides meeting him outside of lectures. Online, this course is very hard and isolating.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: DO. NOT. TAKE. THIS. CLASS. He requires lockdown browser and webcam for each test, which is typical for an online class. However, he views every students test videos and will take up to 50% off of a test if he does not like the angle of the video. I set up my webcam to show my desk, thighs up, work, face, and more and still "violated" the syllabus.

Be prepared to teach math on your own most of the time! Tests are on lockdown browser and they are worth A LOT! He was accessible through collab ultra and if you had questions he would gladly help and did example problems. Not many students joined his sessions maybe that's why they struggled so much. He allowed us to use a formula sheet on tests.

He was horrible at responding to emails and he was overly strict when it came to the LockDown Browser tests. But honestly, this class is fine because it's through ALEKS so he's not really essential for this course. I followed his instructions for the exams and never had an issue. Just do the assignments, watch youtube videos, and you'll survive.

I love math and Im good at it, so I know its not my fault I'm struggling in precalc which I have excelled at before. He is very hard to contact, he doesn't want to help, his rules for tests are so extreme. I wouldve dropped him if I didn't already drop a class.

This man expects way too much out of students during a GLOBAL PANDEMIC. He is oddly specific about lockdown browsers and what he wants to see on them. If he doesnt see what he wants hell fail your test. He also sucks at emails. TAKE SOMEONE ELSE. Please dont do the same thing I did.

Prepare to be your own teacher. He responds to emails slow and his messages often come across rude. I failed the first test and hardcore studied for the rest and got an A on them, so thats the only way I passed with an A. He's EXTREMELY strict with tests to the point that's its stressful. If you dont have time to teach yourself, dont take his class

HE IS HORRIBLE AND SO HARD ON THE LOCKDOWN BROWSER TEST !! IDK WHAT HE WANTS ? Do u wanna see my head ? Do you see my body ? Do you wanna my work ? How am I suppose to look at the computer from such a fat distance . DONT TAKE HIMM

This class almost made me drop out of school. It was strictly online and was so hard to get in contact with him. There were not any lectures so you were basically teaching yourself. Hardest math class ive ever taken and i love math.
its November but I wish I would have dropped this classHORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE . LISTEN NO MATTER HOW MUCH EFFORT YOU PUT IN , IT IS HORRIBLE. MATHWAY AND PHOTOMATH ONLY WORK TO A CERTAIN EXTENT

I would like to think of this class as the BIGGEST MISTAKE! I have no other problems out of my other classes but this one  I WAS SO UNPREPARED THAT I HAD I TO TEACH MYSELF AND RELY ON MY CLASSMATES NOTES TO TEACH ME . btw the notes or videos  on ALEKS DO NOT WORK OR HELP

THIS IS THE ABSOLUTELY WORST PROFESSOR EVER !! HE GRADED UNFAIRLY , and UNNECESSARY! THIS CLASS WAS SO STUPID TO TAKE FOR MY FIRST SEMESTER OF COLLEGE ! HORRIBLE . he has no lectures or teaches on zoom , you teach yourself MATH , used the worst website possible ALEKS ! save yourself ! DO NOT !!!!!  keep in mind hes an hs teacher so no open hours
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Grades arent based on knowledge. He will destroy your grade on test if you dont take the test a certain way on lockdown browser. You could get all questions right and still get a C if your camera wasnt positioned the way he specifically wanted.
he demanded too much especially during this pandemic, took off points if you didnt take a test a certain way, barely taught, too much homework.
